alert.note: Alert for Henry; Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 9:06PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rockdale, east central Henry and central Newton Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 906 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Almon, or near Covington. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Covington, Oxford, Porterdale, Mansfield, Georgia International Horse Park, Magnet, Almon, Starrsville, Oak Hill and Rocky Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
